trigger:
Announcement of the government (PolicyTechnocrats):

“Today, we are announcing a responsible reform to secure the long-term future of the retirement system while protecting those who rely on it today.
The reform updates eligibility rules for younger workers, strengthens support for lower-income retirees, and ensures that those with the greatest resources contribute fairly to the system’s sustainability.
These changes are designed to provide stability for future generations without disrupting current benefits, while preserving individual choice and trust in the system.”
